summary: A Poffin ingredient; when held, cures confusion if the holder is confused. Used in competitive play primarily for the move Fling (70 base power) or as a Berries-activated ability trigger (e.g., Gluttony, Ripen).
typical_users: Pokémon using Fling for coverage or disruption (e.g., some Mew sets), Pokémon with abilities like Gluttony or Ripen that benefit from consuming berries quickly (e.g., Snorlax, Appletun).
